name: Pinterest Home Page Design - Pinterest Clone #4
description:
Develop an eye for good Ui & Ux by creating a Pinterest clone in Figma. In this short video we’ll design Pinterest’s home page using the components that we made in the previous two videos of the “Pinterest Clone in Figma” playlist. The wireframe that we made the first vid we’ll guide us to place our elements.


This is the fourth video in the "Clone Pinterest in Figma" playlist. "Clone Pinterest in Figma" is a playlist of short vids, each focused on taking one or two small steps towards copying Pinterest in Figma.


PINTEREST CLONE IN FIGMA VIDS

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

1 - Pinterest's Home Page Figma Wireframe

2 - How to make Pinterest's Header Components in Figma

3 - How I made Pinterest's Card Component in Figma
